thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ServiceSource Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ServiceSource Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.06
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Servicesource International Inc:
* SERVICESOURCE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.09 TO $0.11
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 TO $0.03
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.20 TO $0.24 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 TO $0.15 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $243 MILLION TO $246 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $53.5 MILLION TO $55.5 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $66 MILLION VERSUS $68.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
